an3.101:1.9: dhantaṃ sandhantaṃ → adhantaṃ asandhantaṃ (s1-3, km), niddhantaṃ aniddhantakasāvaṃ → anihitaṃ anikkhittakasāvaṃ (bj) | aniddhantaṃ anihitaṃ aninnītakasāvaṃ (s1-3, km, pts1)
an3.101:1.11: niddhantaṃ niddhantakasāvaṃ → nihitaṃ nikkhittakasāvaṃ (bj) | nihitaṃ ninnītakasāvaṃ (s1-3, km, pts1)
an3.101:2.5: sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato → sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritavato (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | sasaṅkhāraniggayhavārivāvato (mr) | sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāriyādhigato (?)
an3.101:2.6: sannisīdati ekodi hoti → ekodibhāvaṃ gacchati (si) | ekodibhāvo hoti (s1-3, km, mr)
